background: Financial services API infrastructure handling 500,000 daily transactions with GDPR compliance requirements. Multi-region deployment across us-east-1 and us-west-2 with custom JWT authorization using Python 3.10 Lambda functions. Architecture includes API Gateway REST APIs with custom authorizers, Lambda functions for transaction processing, DynamoDB Global Tables for multi-region data replication, CloudFront for edge optimization, WAF for security (SQL injection, XSS, rate limiting), comprehensive monitoring with CloudWatch dashboards and alarms, X-Ray distributed tracing, Secrets Manager for credential storage, and optional Route 53 latency-based routing. Key features: encryption at rest with KMS, 90-day log retention, least-privilege IAM policies, automated failover between regions, and full observability stack.
author: devang-devops
